content: I added some comments in the section about new policy on telemetry. In short, I think it's a problem for us to even ask such questions, and the asking itself will generate some backlash and potential news stories.
"Wait, this wasn't ruled out without even having to ask? People don't already know this isn't OK?"
I think it'd be fine to ask questions about a system to collect information for the user to submit in a bug report, but not about a system that would automatically submit it.
